test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow) (sort Y teapoy))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y microwave))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X green))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y microwave))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X white) (sort Y desk)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y refrigerator)))) )
test.nl: There is a remotecontrol which is yellow on the teapoy. There is a bottle which is black in the refrigerator. There is a book which is yellow in the microwave. The door of the microwave is opened. Put down a remotecontrol which is green. Put a cup in the microwave. Pick up the white book. Give human the yellow remotecontrol. Put a bottle on the microwave. Take out the yellow book from the microwave. The white cup must be on the desk. A bottle which is black must be in the refrigerator.
